DOC.brief_summary: This follow-up research study determine difference long-term maintenance two diet group , Atkins ' diet ( low-carbohydrate ) LEARN program ( low-fat ) . The Atkins ' diet continue get significant amount popular attention little scientific evaluation . Due small amount scientific data support low-carbohydrate diet give wide spread use type diet , important evaluate long-term safety effectiveness Atkins ' diet . We evaluate whether difference two group 3-years participation initial 1-year study period . We specifically assess weight , cholesterol level , glucose insulin level , eat habit mood originally .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two Approaches Weight Loss Follow-Up Study
DOC.detailed_description: ***PLEASE NOTE : Only participate original study low carbohydrate low fat diet eligable enrollment follow-up study***
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Body mass index 30 40 Live work within 1 hour study site Stable psychological status Exclusion criterion History heart disease , heart attack , stroke Blood pressure > 140/90 mmHg Abnormal cholesterol level Significant psychiatric illness Any medication affect weight metabolic rate Presence history chronic disease know affect appetite , food intake , metabolism ( i.e. , diabetes , thyroid disease , cancer ) Currently use antidepressant , steroid , tobacco , illegal drug Pregnant , breastfeeding , plan pregnancy 10 lb change weight within 6 month study entry History malignant arrhythmia cerebrovascular , renal , hepatic disease History protein waste disease gout Severe arthritis Osteoporosis Certain type hormone replacement therapy Currently follow vegetarian diet
